resources.string: Tip! You can enter punctuation marks without having to delete the space first.

"If you select a secondary language you will get word suggestions from two languages at the same time. The primary language determines the keyboard layout.
Note: Bilingual input only works if both languages use the Latin (ABCâ€¦) alphabet. "
Browse the different layouts and select your favourite
Make sure that the phone is not in silent mode
To personalise your keyboard further, for example by changing keyboard skin, tap @drawable/icon.
